posts.text: If the postgraduate entrance exam fails， what are your plans and will you take it again？

##2022年12月大学六级真题 For this part, you are allowed 30minutes to write an essay that begins with the sentence “In an era of information explosion, it is vitally important to develop the ability to think critically and make rational choices.” You can make statements, give reasons, or cite examples to develop your essay. You should write at least 150words but no more than 200word 关键词：信息化 information 批判性 critical 选择 choice prominent role in 主导下作用 bombarded by 充斥着 The cognitive skills needed to diffferentiate information from misinformation should be developed. make prudent choices Young can consolidate their learning ,challenge the limitations of their current knowledge ,and develop creative and innovative minds with critical thinking.

The Loess Plateau is one of the birthplaces of the Chinese nation. As early as 5500 years ago, people began farming on it. With the sustainable development of farming, the poulation of Loess Plateau has been increasing, and it has become the politial and economic center of China in the Qin and Han Dynasties. Nowdays, with the implementation of the China‘s Western Development Strategy,the economy of the Loess Plateau has developed rapidly.

posts.title: Hello
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
